name: Need To Feed
description:
This is a game about a farmer who grows wheat and then sells it to buy some fuel for his bus to drive aid to Ukraine. 

He can also buy some robots to help him with this task! But plants need water to grow, and you need to refill your watering can after some time. And all of this needs to be done in a short amount of time.

 So, can you help him to do this?
